name.description: Identifier used to refer to the water type.

flat.description: Whether the water type should be opaque, i.e. not show any underwater geometry.

specularStrength.description: The strength of specular reflections on the water surface.

specularGloss.description: The gloss of specular reflections on the water surface.

normalStrength.description: How intensely the normal maps should affect the water surface.

baseOpacity.description: Roughly how transparent the water should be.

fresnelAmount.description: Mix from 0 to 1 between the specified `surfaceColor` and the sky in the reflection.

normalMap.description: Which normal map to use for the water surface.

surfaceColor.description: The color used for the water surface when `fresnelAmount` is low, specified as a hex color code or an array in the range 0-255, in sRGB. Accepts decimals.

foamColor.description: The color used for the foam along the shoreline, specified as a hex color code or an array in the range 0-255, in sRGB. Accepts decimals.

depthColor.description: The color used for the underwater color gradient, specified as a hex color code or an array in the range 0-255, in sRGB. Accepts decimals.

hasFoam.description: Whether shoreline foam should be drawn for the water type.

duration.description: The duration before the UV scrolling repeats. Smaller numbers yield faster scrolling waves.

fishingSpotRecolor.description: A Jagex HSL value to apply to fishing spot replacement models on this water type.
